result.title: Invitation to the February Cook-off 2015 on CodeChef
result.content:
Hello Everyone,

CodeChef invites you to participate in the February Cook-off 2015 at COOK55.

Time: 15th February 2015 (2130 hrs) to 16th February 2015 (0000 hrs). (Indian Standard Time — +5:30 GMT) — Check your timezone.

Details: COOK55

Registration: Just need to have a CodeChef user id to participate.

New users please register here

- Problem Setter : Devendra Agarwal
- Editorialist: Amit Pandey
- Problem Tester: Anudeep Nekantti
- Russian Translator : Sergey Kulik
- Mandarin Translator: Gedi Zheng

It promises to deliver on an interesting set of algorithmic problems with something for all.
The contest is open for all and those, who are interested, are requested to have a CodeChef userid, in order to participate.

You will be receiving amazing & mind-blowing editorials from Amit Pandey just after the contest.
